attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Country has had enough of all the incompetence, propaganda, sleeze, quango's, dubious expenses claims and general government largesse at the expense of the tax payers. 

It's time to get some integrity and accountability back into parliament.

The present government is well on its way to bankrupting, both financially and morally, this once great nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
